_header: If love reigned as it hath been
Note:
See Ringler Jr. (1992)
XRingler Jr., William A. Bibliography and Index of English Verse in Manuscript 1501-1558. London: Mansell, 1992; prepared and completed by Michael Rudick and Susan J. Ringler , TM 729.
_description: A love song ascribed to Henry VIII — seven couplets

BLAdd31922.First Lines: If loue now reynyd as it hath beneAnd war rewardit as it hath sene…
BLAdd31922.Last Lines: …And vnto them which doth it knowBetter than do I I thynk it so
BLAdd31922.Note: Notation only on 48v, words on f. 49.
